Tenders are Invited for the Supply, Delivery and Installation of One (1) Lab Mill System with Internal Classifier
=====================================================

**Contract Reference** | WS4171386688 - Doc4302767076
-------------------------|---------------------------------
**Publication Date** | November 30, 2023
**Closing Date** | January 25, 2024 (14:00 hrs EST)
**Type of Opportunity** | Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Supplier Category** | Government Departments (GD)

### Overview

The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) invites proponents to submit a proposal for the supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) lab mill system with an internal classifier. The delivery point is situated at 303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 3G8.

### Background

This tender opportunity is a competitive process, open to all eligible suppliers. Details of the procurement method, evaluation criteria, and terms and conditions are outlined in the contract documents.

### Notice Type

* English: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* French: Demande de propositions

### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: November 30, 2023
* Closing Date: January 25, 2024 (14:00 hrs EST)

### Point of Contact

Mr. Carlson, Meegan (SPAC/PSPC) can be reached at meegan.carlson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any queries or requests.

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18145760?extsite=MTgxNDU3NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements

This contract award will be subject to the trade agreements as stated in the contract documents.

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents are available on the reference URL provided above. To access the documents, interested suppliers are required to create a user account on the Ariba Discovery website.
